attributes.action: TO HAVE A BINS COLLECTED ON A WEEKLY BASIS TO STOP MAGOTS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I’m petitioning to have the bins collected on a weekly basis to stop MAGOTS.
I understand the reason behind having the bins collected on a fortnightly basis to increase recycling and reduce waste. But I think it would be far better to have smaller bins but collected on a weekly basis.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
